nodes.text: Wick Cooper's penthouse was Wick Cooper's residence in the Wheel's Upper Ring. While fleeing the Imperial officer Estoc and her stormtroopers, Kordi Freemaker and Princess Leia Organa fled into Wick Cooper's residence. They posed as a cleaning team with Kordi posing as cleaning droid. Princess Leia blew their cover when she assaulted Cooper for making fun of the destruction of Alderaan. When the real cleaning droids arrived, Cooper alerted the Imperial authorities.
